the world The original business plan involving space exploration by robots was well underway when the company began to win government and industry contracts and focus shifted iRobot further diversified in 1997 when the first home robotic vacuum cleaner known as iRobot Roomba was developed, , iRobot has since successfully created a consumer home robot category that is changing the way consumers clean Since then, more than 20M robots have been shipped Beyond Roomba, other consumer products include Braava robotic floor mopping Today, iRobot is a NASDAQ listed company IRBT, 1100 employees and revenues FY19 of 12B 11 iRobot is the Robotic Vacuum Cleaning leader and directs today 52 of the category value in Europe With an estimated today HH penetration in the single digits and fast growth, the front potential is immense, , iRobot has a unique culture and it is something that very much defines the business and how it operates It is important that anyone considering joining the organization can embrace its values which are best encapsulated through the companys mission Empower people to do more, , , The iRobot FranceBenelux business has grown rapidly in recent years and this geography continues to hold significant potential iRobot Netherlands contributes to make our regional cluster one of the most successful in EMEA Direct W e build premium products, as well as advise and educate consumers in the retail channel, , Therefore, we are looking for a  responsible for developing, implementing  analyzing Trade Marketing activities as well as working in an internationalcrossfunctional team to optimize and implement a Trade Marketing strategy for Netherlands, , The role is based in Zwolle Netherlands and will report to the Marketing Leader for France and Benelux, , The individual will be responsible to develop and implement local trade marketing strategy, in line with local brand strategy, to achieve overall business targets by driving conversion and enable trade up in store, The appointee will work in collaboration with our internal trade Marketing team based in France cluster FRBx and regional team in London, , The appointee should have experience in premium brand marketing  trade marketing with knowledge on how to drive conversion  Internet and EPP mainly  while entertaining growth in traditional retail

Description, , Trek Bicycle is a global leader in the design and manufacture of bicycles and accessories Trek believes the bicycle can be a simple solution to many of the worlds most complex problems and is committed to breaking down the barriers that prevent people from using bicycles more often for transportation, recreation and inspiration Our mission is to create products we love and take care of our customers We value our team, making sure the best is on the field We value innovative ideas from anywhere, inspiring others with our positive energy, dealing with reality to make the tough calls, and getting things done fast  turning ideas into reality, , As , your primary mission is to sell our solution, hardware, and services to new and existing customers Using your available resources and the help of your teammates and business partners, youll get Ascend into all Trek owned stores and into as many independent retailers as possible in your market Youll go above and beyond to provide the best customer service to everyone to maximize their utilization of our systems and services At Ascend, every team member is in the business of selling, installing, supporting and shipping our worldclass software and services So, in addition to your primary job duties, youll be called on and encouraged to help in all areas of our business, , , , , , , , is the leading provider of retail management systems and services to independent retailers Through our Best System Best Support vision we partner with our customers to help them to grow, maximize their profitability, and create reliable data for making intelligent business decisions, , We are an EVerify employer, , , , EVerify Participation Poster English  Spanish, EVerify Right to Work Poster English  Spanish

Kraft Heinz, The Company, As one of the worlds largest food and beverage companies, we are proud to spark joy around mealtimes with a global portfolio of more than 200 brands Some are iconic brands like Philadelphia Cream Cheese, Kraft Peanut Butter, Kraft Dinner and Heinz Ketchup Others are fast growing new sensations that defy status quo like CRAVE No matter the brand, we are united under one vision  Bringing this vision to life are our 36,000 teammates around the world, making food people love, , Together, we help provide meals to those in need through our global partnership and commitment with Rise Against Hunger And we also stand committed to sustainability, and the health of our planet and its people, , Every day, we are transforming the food industry with bold thinking and unprecedented results If youre passionate like us  and ready to create the future, build on a storied legacy, and participate as a conscientious global citizen  theres one thing to do, , , , Were not afraid to think differently Embrace new ideas Dream big It all comes down to the way we empower our people to own their work Its true Our employees are our competitive advantage, , As part of the Kraft Heinz family youre supported to grow and achieve Youre recognized and rewarded for outstanding performance at every level Youre given the opportunity to leave your mark and build legacies But you wont do it alone This is where our values and teamwork thrives and collaborative spirit fuels every day, , , , We have an excellent opportunity for an enthusiastic BachelorMaster student who is interested in making a difference in Sales at Kraft Heinz, , , , Depending on your profile, your experience and interests, as well as the expertise of our Sales leadership, you will be supporting one of the following teams within Sales, , If you have a preference, please let us know and this will be respected as much as possible, , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , , CV selection based on hard requirementsu202fsuch as EU working rightsu202f Online cultural fit assessment in the form of games  Pymetricsu202f Online video roundu202f Pymetricsu202f Onlineu202fScreening Interviewu202f Onlineu202fHiring manager interviewu202f Amazing internship opportunity that can kickstart your career, , Note The recruitment process can take 46 weeks in total, , , , JanFeb 2021, , 5 or 6 months, , 625 euro per month 40hrs, 5 days  full reimbursement of travel expenses, , Amsterdam, Antwerp, , Become a part of a close intern community as well as a young and ambitious work environment including online, , As a Kraft Heinz intern youll be the owner of your own projects and especially of your own career At Kraft Heinz, we provide the playing field You change the game , , , , , , Like any other company, Kraft Heinz has been affected by the regulations surrounding COVID19 Currently, the Amsterdam office is closed to all 500 employees to guarantee their safety This decision is reevaluated frequently to see when it is safe for all employees to return to the office, , Kraft Heinz has adapted well to the COVID19 restrictions and there is an onlineonboarding day as well as an online handover period You will receive the full allowance and will continue to work from home fulltime by a company provided laptop, as well as a reimbursement to enhance your work from home environment, , , , For any questions regarding these positions or the recruitment process, please feel free to contact, , , , VeraZwikkerkraftheinzcom, Amsterdam

Organization, , Taste  flavour, thats what Epos is all about To continue that legacy, Epos is looking for a product developer just as passionate about tase and flavour as they are As a supplier and producer of herbs, spices, marinades, sauces, seasonings, and additives for the entire food industry, taste is deep in their genes The story of trendsetters in the Netherlands dates back many years Epos has been operating for more than 60 years, it started in 1952 with the Slotemaker family, and every day Epos strives to continue that history, , Every day, Epos employees are fully committed to ensuring that the entire process from purchasing, to delivery, to the customer, runs as effectively and efficiently as possible Epos has an open and accessible culture, , Function, , As a Product Developer at Epos you will be responsible for developing new products, in line with trends in the market and the wishes of the customer, , You will also be responsible for developing and advising on new concepts for retail organisations, as well as devising recipes for the craft and presenting them in trade magazines, , Next to this you will also guarantee that established plans and objectives meet the wishes of new potential customers and are in line with developments in the market, , , , Epos is looking for someone with the following skill set, , , Offer

Job description ABOUT VISUALFABRIQ  Will working for us Unleash Your Excellence Visualfabriq provides CPG Consumer Packaged Goods companies with a truly gamechanging SaaS, cloudbased, AIapplied platform that radically transforms their revenue management and enables them to become futurefit Our company was founded uniquely by CPG industry professionals with significant business experience who created the bestinclass solutions recognized by leading independent analysts Since 2013, we have scaled up rapidly with the largest CPG companies in the world, such as Friesland Campina, Unilever, Mars, Arla, OceanSpray, LOreal, Heineken and Vrumona Visualfabiq Global HQ is in Maarssen, The Netherlands we have offices in New York City, London, Barcelona and Johannesburg, and a strategic partner in Mexico City Across the world, visualfabriq is a highperformance, valuesdriven team with every individual putting our vision into action every day   Customer Engagement Manager  Do you want to grow with us  Our Customer Engagement managers build positive client relationships Engagement managers oversee the customer service operations within a business, dealing with customers directly and often as their first point of contact They assess the clients needs, identify customer requirements, and develop cohesive projects that improve the operations of a business through more efficient procedures and systems Engagement managers divide their time between their office and client offices Engagement managers are strong communicators who are comfortable working with different teams at various levels of a business and have excellent organization skills

Kraft Heinz, The Company, As one of the worlds largest food and beverage companies, we are proud to spark joy around mealtimes with a global portfolio of more than 200 brands Some are iconic brands like Philadelphia Cream Cheese, Kraft Peanut Butter, Kraft Dinner and Heinz Ketchup Others are fast growing new sensations that defy status quo like CRAVE No matter the brand, we are united under one vision  Bringing this vision to life are our 36,000 teammates around the world, making food people love, , Together, we help provide meals to those in need through our global partnership and commitment with Rise Against Hunger And we also stand committed to sustainability, and the health of our planet and its people, , Every day, we are transforming the food industry with bold thinking and unprecedented results If youre passionate like us  and ready to create the future, build on a storied legacy, and participate as a conscientious global citizen  theres one thing to do, , , , Were not afraid to think differently Embrace new ideas Dream big It all comes down to the way we empower our people to own their work Its true Our employees are our competitive advantage, , As part of the Kraft Heinz family youre supported to grow and achieve Youre recognized and rewarded for outstanding performance at every level Youre given the opportunity to leave your mark and build legacies But you wont do it alone This is where our values and teamwork thrives and collaborative spirit fuels every day, , , , , , Responsibilities include, , Meeting ownership, , Professional Attributes, , Amsterdam

We are on the lookout for an impressive Trade Marketing Manager to join our team, , Based in Almere, NL  Immediate Start, , , , Gisou by Negin Mirsalehi is a luxury haircare line by famous Dutch  Persian fashion influencer, Negin Mirsalehi Founded in 2015, the brand has deep roots and a wonderful story of the coming together of family traditions The signature ingredients within these staple products are honey and propolis, derived from the Mirsalehi Bee Garden where Negin and her father continue the 6generation family tradition of beekeeping Using natures gifts Negins mother created a formula to transform hair which is rich in minerals, vitamins and antioxidants, , The mission of Gisou is to inspire people to appreciate and take care of their hair using naturebased products, and to feel beautiful while doing so With their story they want to raise awareness about the importance of bees for the overall ecosystem, and shine a light on the incredible benefits of what they produce, , Gisou is currently available on and offline in over 30 countries, and continues to expand rapidly internationally To continue on this growth trajectory, the team is on the lookout for a multifaceted Marketing Manager, , , , As a Marketing Manager at Gisou you will be building and implementing strategies across the international retail category  campaigns as well as investigating new partnership opportunities You will be the point of contact for our international retailers and will steer, monitor  optimise the market performance of Gisou within each channel, , On a day to day basis you will be responsible for, , TRADE, , , CAMPAIGN, , , , , , , , The opportunity to be part of a young, fun and dynamic team, with a pleasant informal  international working atmosphere and regular fun team activities and drinks Gisou is a fast growing and disruptive beauty company that offers huge opportunities for personal development and growth, , INTERESTED, , We cant wait to hear from you

Introduction, iRobot THE COMPANY BEHIND THE BRAND  THE PRODUCTS, , Headquartered in Bedford, Massachusetts iRobot designs and builds innovative robots that make a difference in peoples lives The company was established in 1990 by three Massachusetts Institute of Technology alumni and began with a vision of robots beyond academia and industry involving practical applications that would change the world The original business plan involving space exploration by robots was well underway when the company began to win government and industry contracts and focus shifted iRobot further diversified in 1997 when the first home robotic vacuum cleaner known as iRobot Roomba was developed, , iRobot has since successfully created a consumer home robot category that is changing the way consumers clean Since then, more than 20M robots have been shipped Beyond Roomba, other consumer products include Braava robotic floor mopping Today, iRobot is a NASDAQ listed company IRBT, 1100 employees and revenues FY19 of 12B 11 iRobot is the Robotic Vacuum Cleaning leader and directs today 52 of the category value in Europe With an estimated today HH penetration in the single digits and fast growth, the front potential is immense, , iRobot has a unique culture and it is something that very much defines the business and how it operates It is important that anyone considering joining the organization can embrace its values which are best encapsulated through the companys mission Empower people to do more, , , The iRobot FranceBenelux business has grown rapidly in recent years and this geography continues to hold significant potential iRobot Netherlands contributes to make our regional cluster one of the most successful in EMEA Direct W e build premium products, as well as advise and educate consumers in the retail channel, , Therefore, we are looking for a  responsible for developing, implementing  analyzing Trade Marketing activities as well as working in an internationalcrossfunctional team to optimize and implement a Trade Marketing strategy for Netherlands, , The role is based in Zwolle Netherlands and will report to the Marketing Leader for France and Benelux, , The individual will be responsible to develop and implement local trade marketing strategy, in line with local brand strategy, to achieve overall business targets by driving conversion and enable trade up in store, The appointee will work in collaboration with our internal trade Marketing team based in France cluster FRBx and regional team in London, , The appointee should have experience in premium brand marketing  trade marketing with knowledge on how to drive conversion Internet and EPP mainly while entertaining growth in traditional retail
